name: UDP-2,4-bis(acetamido)-2,4,6-trideoxy-beta-L-altropyranose hydrolase
comment: possibly intermediate (2,4-bis(acetamido)-2,4,6-trideoxy-alpha-L-altropyranose) multi-step reaction (inverting glycoside hydrolysis and non-enzymatic epimerization)
